name: Project Z.P.K.I.T.N.I.M.A.C.T
description:
Project Z.P.M.K.I.T.N.I.M.A.C.T is a top down dungeon crawler that lets you play as a member of the Yogscast. Defeat the evil Yogs and their minions who have lost the Christmas spirit and help give everyone the best Christmas yet by collecting all sorts of unique items and weapons. Finish the game with the most presents to give and win.

W, A, S, D to move.
Click to shot.
Space to Pick up weapon and Q to throw it away.

MERRY FESTAG EVERYONE!
BUG: weapon pickups don't work for heroes other than lewis or simon, see this as a challenge mode.
